parameters.text:
=You are a job assistant helping extract structured job and company information.

Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON (no backticks or markdown). Use the keys listed below. If a field is unknown, use null or an empty array — never skip a key.

Keys:
- role
- jobID
- company_name
- position
- location
- skills_and_tech_required (array)
- role_description
- yoe
- job_url
- application_url
- company_overview
- industry
- business_model

Input:
Company: {{ $json["company name"] }}
Location: {{ $json["location "] }}
Title: {{ $json["title"] }}
Description: {{ $json["description"] }}
Link: {{ $json["link"] }}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "role": "string",
  "jobID": "string or null",
  "company_name": "string",
  "position": "string",
  "location": "string",
  "skills_and_tech_required": ["string"],
  "role_description": "string",
  "yoe": "string or null",
  "job_url": "string",
  "application_url": "string or null",
  "company_overview": "string or null",
  "industry": "string or null",
  "business_model": "string or null"
}

parameters.text:
=You are a resume assistant that takes a job description {{ $('Append row in sheet').item.json.description }}and a candidate's existing resume content {{ $json.content }}, and tailors only the following parts:

    summary

    internship and experience bullet points

    project descriptions

    skills and expertise

Focus on aligning the candidate’s content with the language, skills, and priorities of the job description. Avoid copying job description text directly. Instead, adapt the candidate’s achievements and tools to highlight relevance.

json.content:
HEMANTH J Vijayanagar, Bengaluru · +91 82173 63366 · hemanthj257@gmail.com LinkedIn · GitHub

PROFILE SUMMARY
Backend developer with hands-on experience designing RESTful microservices, deploying cloud-native apps, and solving real-world problems through scalable backend systems. Built and deployed systems using Python, Django, Node.js, and PostgreSQL with a strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, teamwork, and cloud-based architecture.

EDUCATION
Atria Institute of Technology — B.E. Information Science and Engineering Dec 2021 – June 2025 | CGPA: 8.3 / 10

EXPERIENCES
Infomin Technology — Full Stack Developer Intern Aug 2024 – Feb 2025
Built backend and frontend for a dynamic blog platform using Astro, React, Node.js, and Firebase.
Integrated Firestore and Mailgun for backend workflows and email communications.
Contributed to performance tuning and SEO enhancements, increasing web visibility by 20%.
Collaborated in an agile 3-member team with Git-based version control.
ComedKares — Backend Intern Oct 2023 – Dec 2023
Designed RESTful microservices using Django to support an IVR and WhatsApp-integrated agricultural equipment rental system.
Integrated Twilio APIs and followed modular architecture for maintainability.
Supported 30+ farmers through the app; backend logic validated in field trials.

COMPETITIONS & CONFERENCES
Smart India Hackathon 2023 & 2024 — 2× National Finalist Ahmedabad, Gujarat
Led deep learning research under ISRO mentorship using satellite imagery for geospatial challenges.
2023: Built a change detection model using a Siamese ResNet-18 architecture.
Achieved ~89% accuracy on LEVIR-CD dataset with binary change mask generation.
2024: Designed a GAN-based SAR image colorization model (Pix2Pix) using PyTorch & OpenCV.
Produced RGB visualizations of grayscale SAR inputs.
Startup Mahakumbh – TiE Futurepreneur Challenge — Pitch Participant New Delhi
Represented GeoVista.ai: an AI-powered geospatial analytics platform for real estate and construction.
Pitched to startup founders, technologists, and VCs.
Gained strategic feedback on scalability and market fit.

PROJECTS
WeatherPin — Serverless Weather Forecasting App June 2025
Developed backend using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and Express.js.
Integrated OpenWeatherMap API for location-based forecasts by ZIP/PIN.
Handled deployment via Serverless Framework and tested endpoints using Jest.js.
EGGLang — JavaScript Functional Language Interpreter May 2025
Built an AST-based interpreter with support for arithmetic, conditionals, and functions.
Developed a real-time web playground with parsing and evaluation logic.
Demonstrated backend understanding and custom language design.
CRUD Product Inventory Tracker Oct 2024
Full-stack app using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
Implemented RESTful APIs and relational schema for warehouse inventory.
Structured for microservices and production-readiness.

SKILLS & EXPERTISE
Languages: Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, R, SQL, NoSQL, TypeScript, HTML, CSS
Libraries & Tools: PyTorch, Express.js, Node.js, OpenCV, Astro, React.js, Django, Jest, GraphQL, Tailwind, Gulp, Git, Docker, Unix/Linux, AWS Lambda, API Gateway, MongoDB, MatLab, PostgreSQL, SSH, Serverless, CrewAI, Prisma ORM
Soft Skills: Collaboration, teamwork, mentorship, communication, adaptability, attention to detail, accountability, problem-solving, time management, continuous learning
Courses:
NPTEL: Natural Language Processing, The Joy of Computing Using Python
INFOSYS Springboard: Java Fundamentals, DBMS Part 1, Cloud Computing

VOLUNTEERING
The Literary Club — Discord Moderator
Built custom Discord bots to manage events and improve community engagement.
Rotaract Club of Atria I.T. — International Service Director
Led international campaigns and chaired award-nominated initiatives such as Ocean Awareness.
